titles.title: A resolution reaffirming support for increased media diversity, recognizing May 2018 as "National Media Diversity Month", and encouraging appreciation, awareness, and support for independent, diverse, and local media entities.

A resolution reaffirming support for increased media diversity, recognizing May 2018 as "National Media Diversity Month", and encouraging appreciation, awareness, and support for independent, diverse, and local media entities.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Establishes May 2018 as National Media Diversity Month, during which efforts are encouraged to promote media diversity appreciation and support.
